issue.title: rvalue ref issue with basic_string inserter

discussion.p: In the current working paper, the <string> header synopsis at the end of lists a single operator<< overload for basic_string.

blockquote.pre: template<class charT, class traits, class Allocator> basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<(basic_ostream<charT, traits>&& os, const basic_string<charT,traits,Allocator>& str);

template<class charT, class traits, class Allocator> basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<(basic_ostream<charT, traits>& os, const basic_string<charT,traits,Allocator>& str);
template<class charT, class traits, class Allocator> basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<(basic_ostream<charT, traits>&& os, const basic_string<charT,traits,Allocator>& str);

discussion.p: I believe the synopsis in is correct, and the first of the two signatures in should be deleted.

resolution.p: Delete the first of the two signatures in :

blockquote.pre:
template<class charT, class traits, class Allocator> basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<(basic_ostream<charT, traits>& os, const basic_string<charT,traits,Allocator>& str);
template<class charT, class traits, class Allocator> basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<(basic_ostream<charT, traits>&& os, const basic_string<charT,traits,Allocator>& str);
